```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(lmerTest)
library(rethinking)
library(tidyverse)

# bogus data
data(Howell1)
d <- Howell1
d$age <- (d$age - mean(d$age))/sd(d$age)
set.seed( 1000 )

# train-test
i <- sample(1:nrow(d),size=nrow(d)/2)
d1 <- d[ i , ]
d2 <- d[ -i , ]
```

#6H1. 
```{r}
mean(d1$height)
#centering(d1$height)
#d1$age_scale <- scale(d1$age)

m1 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))

precis(m1) #how 


m2 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age + b2*age^2,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b2 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
  method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))

m3 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age + b2*age^2 + b3*age^3,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b2 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b3 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
  method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))

m4 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age + b2*age^2 + b3*age^3 + b4*age^4,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b2 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b3 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b4 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
  method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))

m5 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age + b2*age^2 + b3*age^3 + b4*age^4 + b5*age^5,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b2 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b3 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b4 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    b5 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
  method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))

m6 <- rethinking::map(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- alpha + b1*age + b2*age^2 + b3*age^3 + b4*age^4 + b5*age^5 + b6*age^6,
    alpha ~ dnorm(140, 20),
    b1 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b2 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b3 ~ dnorm(0, 20),
    b4 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    b5 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    b6 ~ dnorm(0, 10),
    sigma ~ dnorm(0, 20)
  ), data = d1,
  method="Nelder-Mead" ,
control=list(maxit=1e4))


precis(m1)
precis(m2)
precis(m3)
precis(m4)
precis(m5)
precis(m6)
comparisons <- compare(m1, m2, m3, m4, m5, m6)
```

#6H2
```{r}
plot( comparisons , SE=TRUE , dSE=TRUE )
```
